body:
Comment 9: 
hi, galargotv2014 could you please give this patch a try?
I can't reproduce the error with clang/llvm-3.4.

diff -r 1b7c5daffdff src/cmd/gc/go.h
--- a/src/cmd/gc/go.h	Mon Jan 06 16:11:58 2014 -0500
+++ b/src/cmd/gc/go.h	Mon Jan 06 22:23:04 2014 -0500
@@ -78,7 +78,7 @@
 struct	Strlit
 {
 	int32	len;
-	char	s[1]; // variable
+	char	s[]; // variable
 };
 
 enum
